summary: Phase 1 is BLOCKED due to fundamental architectural limitations. The two-chain construction cannot support cross-sign G/H propagation. Fixed broken arithmetic proofs (dovetail functions). Build succeeds with 4 expected sorry warnings. Phase 4 (critical goal) already complete - FALSE axiom replaced with CORRECT axiom.

artifacts.summary: Fixed arithmetic proofs for dovetail functions; 4 temporal sorries remain (blocked)
Updated Phase 1 status to BLOCKED with detailed analysis notes

partial_progress.details: Phase 1 blocked due to architectural limitation: two-chain construction cannot support cross-sign temporal propagation. Research-017 analysis confirms interleaved seed approach does not solve the problem.

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed broken dovetail arithmetic proofs in DovetailingChain.lean. Phase 1 cross-sign propagation is architecturally blocked. Phase 4 (critical goal) is already complete - the FALSE singleFamily_modal_backward_axiom has been replaced with the CORRECT fully_saturated_bmcs_exists axiom.

next_steps: Phase 1 temporal sorries should be accepted as documented technical debt per research-017 Alternative C. The critical goal (Phase 4: replacing FALSE axiom with CORRECT axiom) is already complete. Consider creating a separate task for full canonical model construction (Phase 5) which would eliminate both the axiom and sorries.
